data.title: review: Rehabilitation engineering: Research priorities and trends
data.meta_description: Rehabilitation Engineering is the use of engineering principles applied to rehabilitation, disability, and independent living. Google Scholar is a searchable resource that allows people from around the world to create profiles of their interests and collaborations, and it provides a means to search …
